mapper.sql: id, menu_name, url, perms, menu_type, icon, parent_id, order_num, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by order_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (id, menu_name, url, perms, menu_type, icon, parent_id, order_num, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update sys_menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
